text: The Twelve Months () is a 1973 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Anatoliy Granik.Чем запомнилась актриса Наталья Попова?ДВЕНАДЦАТЬ МЕСЯЦЕВ (1972) It stars Natalya Popova, Marina Maltseva, and Olga Wiklandt. The movie is based on the play by Samuil Marshak with the same name. ==Actors== * Natalya Popova — Stepdaughter * Marina Maltseva — Stepsister * Olga Wiklandt — Stepmother * Liana Zhvaniya — The Queen * Nikolay Volkov — Professor * Tatiyana Pelttser — Gofmejsterina * Leonid Kuravlyov — Soldier * Konstantin Adashevskiy — The Head of the Royal Guard * Alexander Sokolov — The Chancellors your == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1973 fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Anatoliy Granik
title: The Twelve Months (1972 movie)
